skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Has a 30% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff instead if the target is under 2 or more debuffs.
skills.name: Devil Hunt
skills.books:

Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of transferring 2 random debuffs from this Champion to the target.

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns and removes one random debuff from each ally.
skills.name: Rallying Cry
